WordNet Definition: enjoying or showing or marked by joy or pleasure
Wikitionary Definition: Experiencing the effect of favourable fortune; having the feeling arising from the consciousness of well-being or of enjoyment; enjoying good of any kind, as peace, tranquillity, comfort; contented; joyous.

WordNet Definition: characterized by happiness and good fortune
Wikitionary Definition: Having divine aid, or protection, or other blessing.
Extremely happy; full of joy; experiencing, indicating, causing, or characterized by bliss.
Visually dazzling; luminous, lucent, clear, radiant; not dark.
Made of, or relating to, gold.
Pertaining to the halcyon or kingfisher

WordNet Definition: showing or feeling mirth or pleasure or happiness
showing or feeling mirth or pleasure or happiness
Wikitionary Definition: When said of place, landscape or view: having a pleasant appearance, looking bright or cheerful.

WordNet Definition: experiencing or marked by or causing sadness or sorrow or discontent

Wikitionary Definition: Behaving oddly, or as though in distress, due to being overcome by feelings of love.
In a state of misery: very sad, ill, or poor.
Very miserable; sunk in, or accompanied by, deep affliction or distress, as from want, anxiety, or grief; calamitous; woeful; very afflicting.
